summary: Completed comprehensive testing of yoga wellness app - all core functionality working perfectly. Backend APIs 100% functional, frontend UI fully responsive with excellent design implementation following warm orange-gold neumorphic theme.
passed_tests: Home page with user greeting, search, hero section, categories
Explore page with session filtering and programs display
Schedule page with calendar and upcoming sessions
Profile page with user info, stats, and logout
Session detail page with trainer info and play functionality
Responsive design with neumorphic theme implementation
